/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on developing for stressors related to personal trauma, including
sufficient evidence to document occurrence of a personal trauma stressor
information needed regarding a personal trauma stressor
procedure for reviewing for credible evidence of a personal trauma stressor
development to identify the records custodian in claims based on personal trauma
required information in MST claims development letters
obtaining police reports in claims based on personal trauma
, and
personal trauma or MST stressors and the Military Records Research Center (MRRC)
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section B - Development for Posttraumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD) or Other Claims Related to Personal Trauma
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section B
